## ERROR TIPS

### Placement validation errors (continued)
- Verify terrain is completely clear before attempting to place entities (multiple failures on water tiles)
- Check for existing entities in target placement area before attempting placement (failed boiler placement at occupied position)
- Use proper spacing between entities (especially 2x2 and 3x3 buildings)
- For power plants, verify water source availability before placing offshore pumps
- Implement position scanning logic to find nearest valid placement location

### Entity interaction errors (continued)
- Verify entity existence before attempting interactions (failed burner mining drill lookup at x=21.0,y=20.0)
- Check entity attributes before accessing them (furnace.drop_position missing)
- Ensure proper entity type checking before attempting connections (transport belt to furnace)
- Handle missing entity cases gracefully with fallback logic

### Belt system issues (new)
- Clear blocked transport belts before attempting to use them (multiple belt blockage warnings)
- Verify belt connections are valid before attempting long-distance connections
- Check belt directions match the intended flow path
- Implement belt clearing logic when inserters report blocked drop positions

### Power system problems (continued)
- Complete power plant construction before attempting to use electric machines (missing steam engine at x=24.5,y=15.0)
- Verify electrical connections for all powered entities (assembling machine has no power)
- Check power network connectivity for assembling machines
- Ensure proper spacing between power poles for full coverage

### Production chain issues (continued)
- Monitor inserter fuel levels to prevent stalling (multiple inserters with low coal)
- Clear blocked production outputs before continuing operations
- Verify all production chain components are properly connected
- Check intermediate product availability before attempting complex crafts
